articles.title: South Boston man linked to Bulger sentenced to 15 years for involvement in 1984, 1993 cold case killings
articles.description:
The man, who has been linked to James “Whitey” Bulger, pleaded guilty to manslaughter after the initial murder charges were reduced.

The post South Boston man linked to Bulger sentenced to 15 years for involvement in 1984, 1993 cold case killings appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: South Boston man sentenced to 15 years for 1984, 1993 cold case killings.
Man linked to notorious mobster James 'Whitey' Bulger pleaded guilty to manslaughter.
Sentencing brings closure to families affected by these long-unsolved murders.

articles.title: Olney: Red Sox ‘well-positioned’ to try and trade for Tigers ace Tarik Skubal
articles.description:
"Other teams believe the Tigers will seriously consider moving him if they can glean what they want in a trade."

The post Olney: Red Sox ‘well-positioned’ to try and trade for Tigers ace Tarik Skubal appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Red Sox are considering a trade for Tigers ace Tarik Skubal.
Skubal's trade could reshape Boston's pitching lineup for the 2025 season.
Local fans may see increased competitiveness if Skubal joins the team.

articles.title: Judge temporarily halts patron saint statues in Quincy, but PETA wants to help
articles.description:
PETA offered to help cover the cost of the statues if the City of Quincy adds a third statue of St. Francis of Assisi, the patron saint of animals. 

The post Judge temporarily halts patron saint statues in Quincy, but PETA wants to help appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Judge temporarily halts installation of patron saint statues in Quincy, affecting local plans.
PETA proposes funding a third statue of St. Francis of Assisi to support animal welfare.
Quincy residents may see changes in statue plans, impacting community cultural initiatives.

articles.title: Democratic Maine Rep. Jared Golden won’t seek reelection in competitive US House district
articles.description:
Golden wrote that he has “grown tired of the increasing incivility and plain nastiness that are now common from some elements of our American community.”

The post Democratic Maine Rep. Jared Golden won’t seek reelection in competitive US House district appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Maine Rep. Jared Golden announced he won't run for reelection in 2025.
Golden cited increasing incivility in politics as a reason for his decision.
His departure may impact Democratic strategies in the competitive US House district.

articles.title: Bill Belichick commends Drake Maye for an ‘outstanding’ start with Patriots
articles.description:
"They've won a couple of close games, and that's really changed their record."

The post Bill Belichick commends Drake Maye for an ‘outstanding’ start with Patriots appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bill Belichick praises rookie quarterback Drake Maye for his strong performance.
Patriots have won two close games, improving their season record significantly.
Maye's success could energize local fans and boost team morale in Boston.

articles.title: Here’s how many people visited Salem this past Halloween
articles.description:
Salem Halloween crowds remained strong despite some rain and the government shutdown this year.

The post Here’s how many people visited Salem this past Halloween appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Salem attracted large Halloween crowds despite rain and government shutdown.
Approximately 100,000 visitors celebrated Halloween in Salem this year.
Increased tourism benefits local businesses and boosts the economy in Boston area.
